sense.gloss: to load (a gun, etc.), to charge
to include (e.g. tax in a sales price)
to hang over, to shroud, to enshroud, to envelop, to screen

sdata.j: ↑感情↑↓かんじょう↓を↑閉↑↓と↓じ|こめる|ために。
sdata.e: I don't want to let my emotions out.

sdata.j: この↑計画↑↓けいかく↓はある↑程度↑↓ていど↓の↑効果↑↓こうか↓が↑見込↑↓み|こ↓める|。
sdata.e: This plan will serve its purpose to some extent.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓をやり↑込↑↓|こ↓める|くらい、↑赤子↑↓あかご↓の↑手↑↓て↓を↑捻↑↓ねじ↓るより↑簡単↑↓かんたん↓だよ。
sdata.e: Cornering him in an argument is easy—like taking candy from a baby.

sdata.j: その↑女↑↓おんな↓の↑子↑↓こ↓が↑霧↑↓きり↓たち|こめる|↑森↑↓もり↓の↑中↑↓なか↓でなくなっちまった。
sdata.e: The girl disappeared in the misty forest.
